items.name: Mem0
items.description: Universal memory layer for AI agents with 186M+ API calls, exclusive memory provider for AWS Agent SDK

summary.business_use_case: Enable personalized AI experiences with long-term memory
summary.use_case: Provides persistent memory for AI agents to remember user preferences and context across sessions

items.name: Zep
items.description: Context engineering platform with temporal knowledge graphs for fast, accurate, and personalized AI agents

summary.use_case: Systematically engineers relevant context from chat history and business data using temporal knowledge graphs

items.name: Supermemory
items.description: Universal memory API for AI apps with plug-and-play memory infrastructure

summary.use_case: Scalable memory infrastructure that adapts to any stack for custom AI agents

items.name: Letta
items.description: Platform for building stateful agents with advanced memory (formerly MemGPT), 13K+ GitHub stars

summary.business_use_case: Build AI agents that learn and self-improve over time
summary.use_case: LLM operating system with intelligent memory management for context windows

items.name: Memori
items.description: Open-source memory engine for LLMs, AI agents and multi-agent systems

summary.use_case: Memory engine designed for complex multi-agent systems

items.name: Pinecone
items.description: Fully managed serverless vector database with multi-region performance for AI applications

summary.business_use_case: Reliable multi-region vector search without infrastructure management
summary.use_case: Serverless vector database for similarity search with minimal ops

items.name: Weaviate
items.description: Open-source vector database with hybrid search, modularity, and knowledge graph capabilities

summary.use_case: Schema-based vector database for contextual search with GraphQL interface

items.name: Qdrant
items.description: High-performance vector similarity search engine written in Rust with powerful filtering

summary.use_case: Production-ready vector search with compact footprint for cost-sensitive workloads

items.name: Milvus
items.description: Open-source vector database for billion-scale similarity search in AI applications

summary.business_use_case: Enterprise-grade applications with massive vector datasets
summary.use_case: Industrial-scale vector database for billion-vector scenarios

items.name: Chroma
items.description: Open-source embedding database designed for developer-friendly prototyping

items.name: pgvector
items.description: Open-source vector similarity search extension for PostgreSQL

summary.use_case: Vector similarity search directly within PostgreSQL using SQL queries

items.name: Redis
items.description: In-memory data store with vector search capabilities for real-time AI applications

summary.use_case: Fast in-memory vector search for high-throughput AI services

items.name: LangChain
items.description: Framework for developing applications powered by LLMs with memory management and agent orchestration

summary.business_use_case: Build production LLM applications with context retention
summary.use_case: Chain prompts, models, tools, and memory for complex LLM applications

items.name: LlamaIndex
items.description: Data framework for LLM applications specializing in data ingestion and retrieval

items.name: LangGraph
items.description: Framework for building stateful multi-agent applications with persistent memory

summary.use_case: State management and persistent memory for multi-agent systems

items.name: CrewAI

summary.use_case: Orchestrate autonomous AI agents that collaborate on complex tasks

items.description: Leading graph database with GraphRAG capabilities for AI agent memory

summary.business_use_case: Reduce LLM hallucinations by up to 90% with structured knowledge
summary.use_case: Graph database for dynamic knowledge graph memory in AI agents

items.description: Ultra-fast graph database for GraphRAG and AI agent data retrieval

summary.use_case: Fast graph database optimized for AI agent knowledge retrieval

items.description: Temporally-aware knowledge graph memory framework for AI agents by Zep

summary.use_case: Real-time temporally-aware knowledge graph engine for dynamic agent memory

items.description: Built-in memory feature for ChatGPT that remembers user preferences across conversations

items.description: Transparent memory system for Claude with per-project memory spaces and user control

items.description: Cross-chat memory for Gemini Advanced integrated with Google ecosystem

items.description: AWS service for building AI agents with built-in memory strategies including semantic memory
